src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency Beijing, December 11 (Reporter Yangna) A reporter from the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau recently learned from the 2022 Beijing Higher Education Graduate Employment and Entrepreneurship Work Video Conference jointly held by the two units that the number of graduates of Beijing universities in 2022 is expected to reach 26.8 million, an increase of 1.6 million over last year.
test: BEIJING, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- The number of college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 this year, up 6 percent year on year, according to a video conference on employment and entrepreneurship for 2022 college graduates held recently by the Beijing Municipal Commission of Education and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau.

src: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
new_mt: The relevant person in charge of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will strengthen the supply and demand matching, strengthen policy support, expand employment channels, ensure difficult assistance, support innovation and entrepreneurship, and improve service efficiency in the work of employment of graduates of Beijing universities.

src: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
new_mt: On 21st and 22nd, the entrance examination for special talents in middle schools in Beijing will be held unifiedly organized by each district education committee.
test: The special examination for the admission of junior high school students with special talents in Beijing will be organized by the municipal education commissions of the districts.

src: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。

retrieved_ref: It is necessary to intensify education and teaching reforms,to reform the entrance examination and evaluation system,and to change the situation of having one 's entire life decided by one examination, so as to provide a relaxed environment for comprehensive development of students.
new_mt: This year, the proportion of specialized talents in Beijing has been reduced in all districts, and the competition is more intense.

src: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
retrieved_src: 确保义务教育投入，全面普及九年义务教育，有条件的地区基本普及高中阶段教育，稳步扩大高校招生规模，提高高等教育入学率。
retrieved_ref: Efforts should be made to ensure the input for compulsory education,and the nine-year compulsory education should be made universal in all aspects. Education at the senior high school level should basically be made universal in areas where conditions permit.
new_mt: For example, in the East District, the proportion of students with special talents in primary and secondary schools is generally not more than 5% of the total number of students admitted to the school. The planned number of students admitted to the school is 380, and the admission rate is not more than 10% of the planned number of students.

src: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。

test: The registration management departments of the registered fire protection engineer qualification at all levels shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the "Administrative Licensing Law of the People's Republic of China".

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
new_mt: China-Vietnam Joint Military Drill “Peace and Friendship-2021” Concludes Successfully-Xinhua
test: The joint military exercise of “Peace Rescue-2021” between the Chinese and Vietnamese militaries was successfully concluded.

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
retrieved_src: 北韩选手身穿黑西装，打红领带，手上拿着北韩国旗步出飞机，向手持ⅸ韩国统一ⅹ旗子的数十名南韩民众挥手致意。
retrieved_ref: North Korea athletes were dressed in black suits and red ties. They were holding the North Korea flag in their hands when leaving the plane. They waived their hands to the several dozens of South Koreans,who were holding the united Korean flags.
new_mt: On December 12, 2021, the Chinese military medical team participating in the "Peace and Relief-2021" joint exercise with the Vietnamese military safely returned to China. This marks the successful completion of the 7-day joint exercise.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
new_mt: This time, the joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies focused on humanitarian medical rescue, and the two armies closely followed the mission of rescue, relief, and treatment of the wounded. According to the standard of real combat, the joint command of rescue, the joint rescue on the spot, and the mass treatment of the wounded were completed, effectively improving the joint rescue capabilities of the two armies.
test: This joint performance, the Chinese and Vietnamese armies around the humanitarian medical rescue of a major issue, tight grip of the medical mission of the task of the military medical support, according to the standard of the real combat completed the joint medical command, joint field rescue, batch of wounded treatment and other content, effectively enhance the military medical support capabilities of the two armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
new_mt: The results of the joint exercises between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies have been recognized by both sides.
test: The results of the exercise were affirmed by both Chinese and Vietnamese armies.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
retrieved_src: 藉着跟不同国籍、不同背景的军事将领、学者专家、政府官员、文艺工作者……的谈话，我可以学到好多好多东西，对增长见识、开阔视界很有帮助。’
retrieved_ref: We train a person from many different aspects.
new_mt: The Vietnamese People’s Army Medical Department has learned a lot from the Chinese People’s Liberation Army Medical Department.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
new_mt: The results obtained through the drill demonstrated the professional capabilities of the two countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.
test: The results of the joint exercise have proved the professional capabilities of the two countries' medical forces in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
retrieved_src: 根据向布里斯的说法，他主持的恐怖主义与国土安全小组委员会调查发现，中央情报局长期以来缺乏外语能力，也缺乏对抗恐怖主义的特殊核心训练，而联邦调查局除了语言能力与分析能力不足之外，又受限于情报搜集的技术过时，跟不上时代。
retrieved_ref: According to Chambliss,the investigation by his terrorism and homeland security panel found that the CIA has long been lacking foreign language capability and special core anti-terrorism training while the FBI was not keeping pace with the times,restricted by out-of-date intelligence-gathering technology in addition with the lacking of language and analysis ability.
new_mt: Chen, the head of the Chinese guidance and coordination group, said that this exercise is based on the successful joint medical exercise in 2018 and is another innovative practice to open up new ground, with very important milestone significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
new_mt: During the training period, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army.
test: During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, rapid nucleic acid detection instruments and other medical and health materials to the Vietnam People's Army.
